Key Match Events: Ferran Torres scored the only goal of the match in the first half
Post-Match Reflections: Spain's victory sets them up nicely for the knockout stages
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was only the third time in the tournament's history a manager had altered the starting XI so significantly
Others: Spain travels to Cologne next, where they will face one of the four best third-placed teams on June 30 at 8pm UK/3pm ET. Albania are eliminated.
